title: DDFP 602: Week 4 Red Challenge Flag picks & What’s wrong with the Patriots’ defense?
itunes:title: DDFP 602: Week 4 Red Challenge Flag picks & What’s wrong with the Patriots’ defense?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Matt “Money” Smith and Cynthia Frelund to discuss their favorite all-time NFL rivalries and determine which division they’d watch if they could only watch one for the rest of 2017 (13:27). Then, in this week’s edition of “Cynthesize It!” Cynthia breaks down the surprisingly poor performance by the Patriots’ defense so far and projects as to how they may improve this season (19:24). Lastly, EmmaVP reads her Week 4 "TV Guide" descriptions for the biggest matchups of the week for the guys to preview and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (32:54).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
